4.subtask_description: Post a short summary of the top 5 artists to Slack General channel.

1.handles: Listing Slack channels to locate the General channel

input_vars.name: slack_list_limit
input_vars.description: Maximum number of channels to fetch

output_vars.name: general_channel_id
output_vars.description: Slack channel ID for the General channel

2.handles: Posting a summary to the General channel

input_vars.name: general_channel_id
input_vars.description: Channel ID for the General channel

input_vars.name: summary_text
input_vars.description: Summary message about the top 5 artists and short backgrounds
input_vars.value: Here is a brief summary of the top 5 artists in the Chinook database, their album counts, and short backgrounds.

output_vars.name: slack_post_confirmation
output_vars.description: Confirmation of the posted Slack message
output_vars.value:
{
      "ok": true,
      "channel": "C075CU6FVE0",
      "timestamp": "1745726489.303759",
      "message_text": "Here is a brief summary of the top 5 artists in the Chinook database, their album counts, and short backgrounds.",
      "bot_name": "llm_agents"
    }
